title: Short videos in (african) french
description: There's a lack of videos in (african) french about the working of Cardano's blockchain.
solution:
\- Translate official material from IOHK or use existing one forum.cardano.org

\- Record two 10 minutes explanatory video in french per month
experience:
A team of computer science teachers & students speaking French & English.

We've presented the blockchain and Cardano to hundred of students
